EventDescription.SourceString: The Legion has planted seeds of madness into the minds of some of the Light’s First clergy. They’re targeting the most pious; implanting a faux sense of spirituality that can drive the devout mad. Violence and rebellion has broken out in several regions. The most tainted have taken to calling themselves the “Sun-Scarred.” Quash the rebellion and free the infected of their burning fervor. Complete levels for rewards.
